column1: How can I create a Poll for my Group?
column2:
To create a Poll for your Group, please follow the steps below:
1. Click “Groups” from the main navigation menu bar at the top of any page on this community.
2. Go to your Group.
3. Click the “Polls” tab on the Group Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the tabs menu to see “Polls”.
4. Click “Create Poll” to create your poll.
5. Fill up the form.
6. When you are done, click on “Create Poll” button to add this Poll to your Group.

column1: Which all Polls can I delete from my Group?
column2: You can delete any Poll from your Group. Poll owners and our site administrators can also delete Polls from your Group.

column1: Who all can vote on my Poll?
column2: You can choose who all can vote on your Poll while creating your Poll, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Voting Privacy” field.
